relevant_findings.cardac_findings: Regular heart rate and rhythm, no murmurs, rubs, or gallops
relevant_findings.extremities: Warm, without edema, symmetric distal pulses

relevant_findings.consciousness: Alert and oriented at baseline, transient episodes of lethargy and disorientation
relevant_findings.extremities: Cool, irregular and thready distal pulses

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Decline in vital signs with hypotension and bradycardia after atenolol administration
